description.plain:
Biig Piig is an Irish artist who grew up between Ireland, Spain, and London–she is currently residing in London. She sings and raps in both English and Spanish.  According to Wikipedia, her full name is Jessica Smyth, but she has introduced herself as just ‘Jess’ on her Spotify bio page.

An article by The Line of Best Fit reveals that she found the name “Biig Piig” on a pizza menu.

She is also a part of NiNE8, a collective of UK artists that includes Lava La Rue, Bone Slim, Nayana IZ, LORENZORSV, L!BAAN, Nige, KxRN, and Mac Wetha.
